entry.title: Once more with feeling: Hello World!
entry.summary: So this is my blog, you don't see them but all of the Wordpress files I had in the past are now here. Now I'm trying to reorganise the whole thing so it does make some sense, which it doesn't currently. Then I'm breaking maikel.uk…
entry.content:
So this is my blog, you don't see them but all of the Wordpress files I had in the past are now here.Â 

Now I'm trying to reorganise the whole thing so it does make some sense, which it doesn't currently.

Then I'm breaking maikel.uk down and starting to work with maikel.dev. This site should be in blog.maikel.dev
